#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

long long mod=1e9+7;

long long power(long long n,long long exp){
    if(exp==0){
        return 1;
    }
    else if(exp==1){
        return n;
    }
    else{
        if(exp%2==0){
            return ((power(n,exp/2)%mod)*(power(n,exp/2)%mod))%mod;
        }
        else{
            return ((((power(n,exp/2)%mod)*(power(n,exp/2)%mod))%mod)*n)%mod;    }
    }
}

int main() {
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    for(int p=0;p<t;p++){
        int n;
        cin >> n;
        long long ans=(((7*((10*(power(10,n)-1))%mod-9*n))%mod)*123456791)%mod;
        cout << ans << endl;
    }
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
